english.segment1: Baby, baby, I'm taken with the notion. To love you with the sweetest of devotion. Baby, baby, my tender love will flow from the fluest sky to the deepest ocean.
english.segment2: Stop for a minute. Baby, I'm so glad you're mine, yeah. You're mine.
english.segment3: Baby, baby, the stars are shining for you and just like me, I'm sure that they adore you. Baby, baby, go walking through the forest. The birds above are singing you a chorus.
english.segment4: Stop for a minute. Baby, they're so glad you're mine, oh yeah. And ever since the day you put my heart in motion. Baby, I realize that there's just no getting over you.
english.segment5: Baby, baby, in any kind of weather I'm here for you always and forever. Baby, baby, no muscle man could sever. My love for you is true and it will never.
english.segment6: Stop for a minute. Baby, I'm so glad you're mine. And ever since the you put my heart in motion. Baby, I realize there's no getting over you.
english.segment7: And ever since the day you put my heart in motion. Baby, I realize that there's just no getting over you, oh babe.
english.segment8: When I think about you, it makes me smile. Baby, baby, be mine. Don't stop giving love. Don't stop, no.
english.segment9: Glad that you're mine. Baby, I'm so glad. When I think about you, it makes me smile. Baby, baby, be mine.
